title: According To Thy Gracious Word
presentation: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

v1: This will I do, my dying Lord,
v2: Thy body, broken for my sake,
My bread from heav'n shall be;
v4: When to the cross I turn mine eyes
O Lamb of God, my sacrifice,
v5: Remember Thee and all Thy pains
And all Thy love to me;
Yea, while a breath, a pulse remains,
v6: And when these failing lips grow dumb
When Thou shalt in Thy kingdom come,
